name: Jettison (trevor.housten)
description: “Jettison is a fast-paced over-the-shoulder arena shooter where players take the role of cyber-samurai battling for dominance on the streets of Neo New York. All match play takes place in local split-screen multiplayer, but leverages cutting-edge Challonge tournament technology to enhance the stakes of every bout. Grab a friend to slash, shoot, and dash your way to victory!”
